name: uncarpeted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An uncarpeted room has no carpet on the floor: His footsteps echoed on the uncarpeted floor. I followed her up a flight of uncarpeted stairs.
More examplesFewer examplesThe high walls of his uncarpeted room were free from pictures. The rest of the ground floor is an uncarpeted working space with tables and chairs. The stairs led directly on to a spacious landing, empty and uncarpeted. The wooden floor was uncarpeted apart from a small rug in front of the fireplace.
